ComicInfo.Summary: Trial By Fire: Rai-Kee returns to tell her Axiom agent allies about her recent adventures with Pitt and the fact that Timmy is now languishing in a coma. Watching over Timmy from outside of the hospital, Pitt saves a woman from being mugged but she repays his kindness by turning into a wolf-like creature and attacking him. Pitt kills the creature and it turns back into a woman, just as Sauras and Kite show up, making the two heroes believe that Pitt has killed an innocent woman.
ComicInfo.Title: Trial By Fire
